headline.main: Stoudemire to Come Off the Bench Against Portland

docs.snippet: Since Coach Gregg Popovich gave his three stars a game off, resulting in a $250,000 fine, they have led the San Antonio Spurs to 12 wins in 16 games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Since Coach Gregg Popovich gave his three stars a game off, resulting in a $250,000 fine, they have led the San Antonio Spurs to 12 wins in 16 games.
docs.abstract: San Antonio Spurs veteran Big Three stars--Tony Parker, Tim Duncan and Manu Ginobili--have led Spurs to 12 wins in 16 games since coach Gregg Popovich incurred NBA fine of $250,000 for resting all three for one game.

headline.main: Vindication for Popovich: Spurs Are Playing With Vigor
headline.print_headline: Vindication for Popovich: Spurs Are Playing With Vigor

docs.snippet: Despite a roster overhaul, new arena, new address and recent change in coach, the Nets closed 2012 much as they began it: looking hapless and lost, this time in a blowout to the Spurs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite a roster overhaul, new arena, new address and recent change in coach, the Nets closed 2012 much as they began it: looking hapless and lost, this time in a blowout to the Spurs.
docs.abstract: San Antonio Spurs defeat Brooklyn Nets, 104-73; Nets score franchise-record low of 5 points in third quarter in worst loss of season.

headline.seo: Nets, With P.J. Carlesimo, Break Down Against Spurs
headline.main: 5-Point Period Leads to Nets’ Worst Loss of Season
headline.print_headline: 5-Point Period Leads to Nets’ Worst Loss of Season

docs.snippet: The new exhibition on Louis C. Tiffany samples the Tiffany Studios’ enormous production of stained-glass windows as well as all kinds of other church-related objects....
docs.lead_paragraph: The new exhibition on Louis C. Tiffany samples the Tiffany Studios’ enormous production of stained-glass windows as well as all kinds of other church-related objects.
docs.abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Museum of Biblical Art exhibit Louis C Tiffany and the Art of Devotion featuring stained-glass windows and other church-related objects.
